title: Which are some less known problems associated with renewable energy? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1- variation of output with time, environment conditions, maintenance, weather 2- managing surge conditions 3- how to ensure continuous uninterrupted supply in the face of output variations 4- energy storage, which is becoming major factor 5- manpower trainings required 6- technology awareness 7- efficient utilisation in combination with grid supply 8- maintenance requirements
